data.generic_openai_api_endpoint: Generic OpenAI API Full URL (should end with 'completions')

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Please check your settings and network.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This AI provider is already configured. You can edit it from the integrations page.

init.title: Opcions del Suggeridor d'Automatitzacions amb IA

data.openrouter_reasoning_max_tokens: Màxim de fitxes de raonament d'OpenRouter
data.generic_openai_api_endpoint: URL completa de l'API d'OpenAI genèrica (ha d'acabar en 'completions')
data.generic_openai_validation_endpoint: URL de validació (OpenAI Genèric, ha d'acabar en 'models')

init.description: Ajusta la configuració dels teus proveïdors d'IA. S'utilitzaran els camps rellevants per al proveïdor que hagis configurat. Els ajustos comuns, com els límits de fitxes, es configuren per a cada proveïdor.

error.invalid_input: One or more values are invalid.

provider_config.name: Provider Configuration
provider_config.description: Which provider configuration to use (if you have multiple)

custom_prompt.name: Custom Prompt
custom_prompt.description: Optional custom prompt to override the default system prompt or guide the suggestions towards specific themes

all_entities.name: Consider All Entities
all_entities.description: If true, consider all entities instead of just new entities.

domains.name: Domains
domains.description: List of domains to consider. If empty, consider all domains.

entity_limit.name: Entity Limit
entity_limit.description: Maximum number of entities to consider (randomly selected).

automation_read_yaml.name: Read 'automations.yaml' file
automation_read_yaml.description: Reads and appends the YAML code of the automations found in the 'automations.yaml' file. This action will use a lot of input tokens, use it with care and with models with a large context window (e.g. Gemini).

automation_limit.name: Automation Limit
automation_limit.description: Maximum number of automations to analyze (default: 100).
